title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are currently enabled, but they don't have any effect when moved. This can be misleading, especially when opening small images like icons.
OB:
Build F2 (20020602)
Redhat 7.2, GTK2
KDE 2.2
(GTK2 only)

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.

Observed behavior:
- The scrollbars are enabled.
- The scrollbars can be moved around.
- However, the scrollbars do not have any effect when moved.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled to avoid confusion.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) with Redhat 7.2, GTK2, and KDE 2.2 (GTK2 only).
2. Observe that the scrollbars are enabled.
3. Attempt to move the scrollbars and notice that they have no effect.
